name: Fusion Abomination Prototype
description:
Controls:

-Left click to pickup or drag objects

-Right click to switch hands

-You can move up to the cupboard to store units. 

-Units will only fight while in pot.

-When both hands are holding the same unit, a portal will appear in the middle of the screen. Move hands to the portal to fuse both units.

Made for Godot Wild Jam # 33,  but I didnt finish it in time, but i have fun drawing the creatures. Theme was "Not Hero", so i was thinking a simple "Mix two identical thing to make cooler stuff" type of game. But i started scope creeping by making the units fight. Lessons learned, will try to cut game idea, make it simple.
